content: diamond in the ruff is knitted flat from the top down the diamond panel of single crosses does not require a cable needle and the repeat is very easy to remember finished chest/back measurements in inches 14 5/11 20 5/14 24 5/18 29/21 the extra small and small sizes use 1 skein of plymouth yarn encore tweed **all proceeds raised from the sale of this pattern will be donated to an animal charity ** visit my website www jojoknits com for other pet *and* people patterns like me on facebook at www facebook com/jojoknitting for notice of new patterns and blog posts
